Package ohos.agp.components

Class FlexLayout.LayoutConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
      • ohos.agp.components.FlexLayout.LayoutConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    FlexLayout

    public static class FlexLayout.LayoutConfig
extends ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
    Implements the configuration of layout parameters and attributes for a component within a FlexLayout.
    Since:
    7

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig

        height, MATCH_CONTENT, MATCH_PARENT, width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LayoutConfig​(int width, int height)
      A constructor used to create a FlexLayout.LayoutConfig instance based on the specified width and height.
      LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to create a FlexLayout.LayoutConfig instance based on the attributes of a given ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.
      LayoutConfig​(FlexLayout.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to create a FlexLayout.LayoutConfig based on the attributes of another FlexLayout.LayoutConfig.
      LayoutConfig​(Context context, AttrSet attrSet)
      A constructor used to create a FlexLayout.LayoutConfig instance based on the context and attribute set.

      void setAlignSelf​(AlignSelf alignSelf)
      Sets the align self attribute, which specifies how the component is aligned along the cross axis.

      Sets the flex grow factor, which determines how much the component will grow relative to the other components in the FlexLayout when a positive free space is distributed.

      Sets the flex shrink factor, which determines how much the component will shrink relative to the other components in the FlexLayout when a negative free space is distributed.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(Context context,
                    AttrSet attrSet)
        A constructor used to create a FlexLayout.LayoutConfig instance based on the context and attribute set.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        attrSet - Indicates the attribute set to use.
        Since:
        7

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(int width,
                    int height)
        A constructor used to create a FlexLayout.LayoutConfig instance based on the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width to use, which can be a particular value, ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        height - Indicates the height to use, which can be a particular value, ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        Since:
        7

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to create a FlexLayout.LayoutConfig instance based on the attributes of a given ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.
        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the source layout.
        Since:
        7

      • LayoutConfig

        A constructor used to create a FlexLayout.LayoutConfig based on the attributes of another FlexLayout.LayoutConfig.
        Parameters:
        source - Indicates the source layout.
        Since:
        7

      • setFlexGrow

        public void setFlexGrow​(float flexGrow)
        Sets the flex grow factor, which determines how much the component will grow relative to the other components in the FlexLayout when a positive free space is distributed.
        Parameters:
        flexGrow - Indicates the flex grow factor to set. A negative value will be ignored.
        Since:
        7

      • getFlexGrow

        public float getFlexGrow​()
        Obtains the flex grow factor of the component.
        Returns:
        Returns the flex grow factor.
        Since:

        Sets the flex shrink factor, which determines how much the component will shrink relative to the other components in the FlexLayout when a negative free space is distributed.
        Parameters:
        flexShrink - Indicates the flex shrink factor to set. A negative value will be ignored.

        public void setAlignSelf​(AlignSelf alignSelf)

        Parameters:

        Since:

      • getAlignSelf

        public AlignSelf getAlignSelf​()

        Returns:

        Since:
        7

      • setFlexBasisFraction

        public void setFlexBasisFraction​(float flexBasisFraction)
        Sets the fraction value, which determines the initial main size of the component relative to its container's main size.

        This setting is effective only when the FlexLayout's main size is determined, for example, the EstimateSpec for the layout is EstimateSpec#PRECISE during the measure process. It will override the dimension specified by ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.width or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.height.

        Parameters:
        flexBasisFraction - Indicates the fraction value to set, which must be in range of [0.0, 1.0].
        Since:
        7

      • getFlexBasisFraction

        public float getFlexBasisFraction​()
        Obtains the fraction value, which determines the main size of the component relative to its FlexLayout.
        Returns:
        Returns the fraction value if any; returns -1.0 otherwise.
        Since:
        7
